Overview

Matcher asserting the string or document matches the expected value.

Back To Top

Parameters

Instance Methods

#description => String

Returns

  • (String) — the description of the matcher.

#does_not_match?(actual) => true, false

Parameters

  • actual (Object) — the object to match.

Returns

  • (true, false) — false if the object matches the expected snapshot, otherwise true.

#failure_message => String

Returns

  • (String) — the message to display on failure.

#failure_message_when_negated => String

Returns

  • (String) — the message to display on failure for a negated matcher.

#matches?(actual) => true, false

Parameters

  • actual (Object) — the object to match.

Returns

  • (true, false) — true if the object matches the expected snapshot, otherwise false.
